introduction.TEXT:
Huh. Where'd you even get 
that hammer sigil?

Forget it. Since you have my 
sigil I guess I'll offer my 
services.

Blacksmithing. I specialize in 
sigils though. I'll be able
give you a little background
on them.

I know a bit of strengthening
too, so I can give you buffs
to your production.

Lastly, rust is a currency.
Even though I live in a place
surrounded by rust, I can't
leave this room.

Bring me some and I'll buff
some more things.

You can just grab some from
the ground outside and-

Unless you don't uh have
arms.

In any case some will get
shaken off the wheel
as it spins.

It will happen less often
as time goes on though.
Be warned.
